General notifications general_notifications All notifications with a normal priority will use this channel Show simple notification Show with expandable text Show with inbox style Open channel notifications Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Basic notification Recently we have discussed the emerging concept of smart farming that makes agriculture more efficient and effective with the help of high-precision algorithms. The mechanism that drives it is Machine Learning — the scientific field that gives machines the ability to learn without being strictly programmed. It has emerged together with big data technologies and high-performance computing to create new opportunities to unravel, quantify, and understand data intensive processes in agricultural operational environments.
